table.name: vtiger_localcarrier
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_localcarrier` ( `localcarrierid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `carrier_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `vanline_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `address2` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `zip` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `phone1` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `fax` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `website` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mc_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dot_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_localcarriercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_localcarriercf` ( `localcarrierid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`localcarrierid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
